api_list.name: get user info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newapi24.p.rapidapi.com/userinfo/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newapi24.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://newapi24.p.rapidapi.com/userinfo/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newapi24.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
